title: OPL 2016 Finals Hoyts viewing parties
body:
Hey everyone,
http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/assets/hoyts-viewing-parties/img/spotlight.jpg
The OPL Split 1 finals are happening this Tuesday night! Come along and enjoy the Chiefs vs Legacy match up in the grand finals together with local players.

Check out full details and events here - http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/hoyts-viewing-parties/

Make sure you hit going to our community organisers facebook events. They will keep you guys updated about the day and any activities they have planned!

They are working hard to get other Hoyts venues the capability to accept direct satellite feeds. As they become available, I'm sure more Hoyts venues will be hosting League of Legends.

i can almost {{champion:86}} {{champion:17}} . they can stream the game though twich/youtube.

Oh definitely it could be via twitch or YouTube, however, like many places, you do require a constant, stable connection. Also for larger event, such as Worlds, regardless of how stable your connection may be, there may be internet issues further down the line (which has been the case at many previous events).

With Satellite, it provide a clear, awesome quality that is stable since it is being transmitted direct to the locations without having to go through the internet.

Hi, 
I'll be hosting the [Auckland - Sylvia Park Viewing](http://www.hoyts.co.nz/movies/2016/league_of_legends_2016_opl_split_1_final.aspx) will have plenty of mini-games and entertainment. University of Auckland's League of Legends club will be giving away some bonus swag on top of the IP Boost you'll receive from attending. Last time was a ball, so hope to see the atmosphere grow this time!
